This project is broken down into 6 milestones and there will be two major themes, the first is an analysis pipeline and the second is the creation of a dashboard using the same dataset.

## Milestone 1: Choose dataset, research question and do EDA

In this milestone you will be expected to choose a dataset appropriate for the STAT 547 team project.

## Milestone 2: Write scripts to load, clean, and wrangle your data then automate your EDA plots

## Milestone 3: Add a script to do a linear regression, add tests to functions and finalize report

## Milestone 4: Sketch of your dashboard (and address TA and peer feedback)

## Milestone 5: First draft of dashboard

## Milestone 6: Final version of deployed dashboard
